sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase between 2010 and 2014; while America, Dutch, India and Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The value of America, Dutch, India and Britain is greatly lower than Japan in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of Japan.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase between 2010 and 2014; while America, Dutch, India and Britain keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The value of America, Dutch, India and Britain is greatly lower than Japan in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of Japan.
